head.supplied: Melbourne 6/11/73. ¶ ¶ Allow me, honored and venerable friend, to send you a few fragments of Stipateretifolia Stendel (Dipladene stipoides J. Hooker) and to ask you to inform me kindly whether, as I...

div.p: Bibliothèque de l'Institut de France, Paris.

Allow me, honored and venerable friend, to send you a few fragments of Stipateretifolia Stendel (Dipladene stipoides J. Hooker) and to ask you to inform me kindly whether, as I suppose, it is identical with La Billardière's Stipa florescens. I am under the impression, that it is the true plant of La Billardières but this can only ascertained by a comparison of his orginal specimen in your Museum. The contracted panicle is rather peculiar and so the patent indument on the outer sepal, which is fairly delineated by Poiteau or La Billardieres plate
If I can be of any utility here, pray command my services
